1: וַיְהִ֗י <sup>1961 </sup> <n>came</n> אַחַר֙ <sup>310 </sup> <n>And it came to pass after</n> הַדְּבָרִ֣ים <sup>1697 </sup> <n>these things</n> הָאֵ֔לֶּה <sup>428 </sup> <n>these</n> כֶּ֧רֶם <sup>3754 </sup> <n>had a vineyard</n> הָיָ֛ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>had</n> לְנָב֥וֹת <sup>5022 </sup> <n>[that] Naboth</n> הַיִּזְרְעֵאלִ֖י <sup>3158 </sup> <n>the Jezreelite</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> בְּיִזְרְעֶ֑אל <sup>3157 </sup> <n>which [was] in Jezreel</n> אֵ֚צֶל <sup>681 </sup> <n>hard by</n> הֵיכַ֣ל <sup>1964 </sup> <n>the palace</n> אַחְאָ֔ב <sup>256 </sup> <n>of Ahab</n> מֶ֖לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>king</n> שֹׁמְרֽוֹן׃ <sup>8111 </sup> <n>of Samaria</n>
2: וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <sup>1696 </sup> <n>spake</n> אַחְאָ֣ב <sup>256 </sup> <n>And Ahab</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> נָב֣וֹת ׀ <sup>5022 </sup> <n>unto Naboth</n> לֵאמֹר֩ ׀ <sup>559 </sup> <n>saying</n> תְּנָה־ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>Give</n> לִּ֨י אֶֽת־ <sup>853 </sup> כַּרְמְךָ֜ <sup>3754 </sup> <n>me thy vineyard</n> וִֽיהִי־ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>may have</n> לִ֣י לְגַן־ <sup>1588 </sup> <n>that I may have it for a garden</n> יָרָ֗ק <sup>3419 </sup> <n>of herbs</n> כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>because</n> ה֤וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>it</n> קָרוֹב֙ <sup>7138 </sup> <n>because it [is] near</n> אֵ֣צֶל <sup>681 </sup> <n>unto</n> בֵּיתִ֔י <sup>1004 </sup> <n>my house</n> וְאֶתְּנָ֤ה <sup>5414 </sup> <n>and I will give</n> לְךָ֙ תַּחְתָּ֔יו <sup>8478 </sup> <n>place</n> כֶּ֖רֶם <sup>3754 </sup> <n>vineyard</n> ט֣וֹב <sup>2896 </sup> <n>thee for it a better</n> מִמֶּ֑נּוּ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>than</n> אִ֚ם <sup>518 </sup> <n>if</n> ט֣וֹב <sup>2896 </sup> <n>than it [or] if it seem good</n> בְּעֵינֶ֔יךָ <sup>5869 </sup> <n>to thee</n> אֶתְּנָה־ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>I will give</n> לְךָ֥ כֶ֖סֶף <sup>3701 </sup> <n>of it in money</n> מְחִ֥יר <sup>4242 </sup> <n>thee the worth</n> זֶֽה׃ <sup>2088 </sup> <n>he</n>
3: וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> נָב֖וֹת <sup>5022 </sup> <n>And Naboth</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> אַחְאָ֑ב <sup>256 </sup> <n>to Ahab</n> חָלִ֤ילָה <sup>2486 </sup> <n>forbid</n> לִּי֙ מֵֽיהוָ֔ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>The LORD</n> מִתִּתִּ֛י <sup>5414 </sup> <n>it me that I should give</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> נַחֲלַ֥ת <sup>5159 </sup> <n>the inheritance</n> אֲבֹתַ֖י <sup>1 </sup> <n>of my fathers</n> לָֽךְ׃
4: וַיָּבֹא֩ <sup>935 </sup> <n>came</n> אַחְאָ֨ב <sup>256 </sup> <n>And Ahab</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>into</n> בֵּית֜וֹ <sup>1004 </sup> <n>into his house</n> סַ֣ר <sup>5620 </sup> <n>heavy</n> וְזָעֵ֗ף <sup>2198 </sup> <n>and displeased</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>because</n> הַדָּבָר֙ <sup>1697 </sup> <n>because of the word</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> דִּבֶּ֣ר <sup>1696 </sup> <n>had spoken</n> אֵלָ֗יו <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> נָבוֹת֙ <sup>5022 </sup> <n>which Naboth</n> הַיִּזְרְעֵאלִ֔י <sup>3158 </sup> <n>the Jezreelite</n> וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>to him for he had said</n> לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>no</n> אֶתֵּ֥ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>I will not give</n> לְךָ֖ אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> נַחֲלַ֣ת <sup>5159 </sup> <n>thee the inheritance</n> אֲבוֹתָ֑י <sup>1 </sup> <n>of my fathers</n> וַיִּשְׁכַּב֙ <sup>7901 </sup> <n>And he laid him down</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>because</n> מִטָּת֔וֹ <sup>4296 </sup> <n>upon his bed</n> וַיַּסֵּ֥ב <sup>5437 </sup> <n>and turned away</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> פָּנָ֖יו <sup>6440 </sup> <n>his face</n> וְלֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>no</n> אָ֥כַל <sup>398 </sup> <n>and would eat</n> לָֽחֶם׃ <sup>3899 </sup> <n>no bread</n>
5: וַתָּבֹ֥א <sup>935 </sup> <n>came</n> אֵלָ֖יו <sup>413 </sup> <n>But</n> אִיזֶ֣בֶל <sup>348 </sup> <n>But Jezebel</n> אִשְׁתּ֑וֹ <sup>802 </sup> <n>his wife</n> וַתְּדַבֵּ֣ר <sup>1696 </sup> <n>to him and said</n> אֵלָ֗יו <sup>413 </sup> <n>to him</n> מַה־ <sup>4100 </sup> <n>How</n> זֶּה֙ <sup>2088 </sup> <n>he</n> רוּחֲךָ֣ <sup>7307 </sup> <n>unto him Why is thy spirit</n> סָרָ֔ה <sup>5620 </sup> <n>so sad</n> וְאֵינְךָ֖ <sup>369 </sup> <n>you are not</n> אֹכֵ֥ל <sup>398 </sup> <n>that thou eatest</n> לָֽחֶם׃ <sup>3899 </sup> <n>bread</n>
6: וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <sup>1696 </sup> <n>And he said</n> אֵלֶ֗יהָ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to her</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>Because</n> אֲ֠דַבֵּר <sup>1696 </sup> <n>unto her Because I spake</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> נָב֨וֹת <sup>5022 </sup> <n>unto Naboth</n> הַיִּזְרְעֵאלִ֜י <sup>3158 </sup> <n>the Jezreelite</n> וָאֹ֣מַר <sup>559 </sup> <n>and said</n> ל֗וֹ תְּנָה־ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>unto him Give</n> לִּ֤י אֶֽת־ <sup>853 </sup> כַּרְמְךָ֙ <sup>3754 </sup> <n>me thy vineyard</n> בְּכֶ֔סֶף <sup>3701 </sup> <n>for money</n> א֚וֹ <sup>176 </sup> <n>or</n> אִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>if</n> חָפֵ֣ץ <sup>2655 </sup> <n>or else if it please</n> אַתָּ֔ה <sup>859 </sup> <n>I</n> אֶתְּנָה־ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>thee I will give</n> לְךָ֥ כֶ֖רֶם <sup>3754 </sup> <n>thee [another] vineyard</n> תַּחְתָּ֑יו <sup>8478 </sup> <n>Thahash</n> וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>for it and he answered</n> לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>I will not</n> אֶתֵּ֥ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>I will not give</n> לְךָ֖ אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> כַּרְמִֽי׃ <sup>3754 </sup> <n>thee my vineyard</n>
7: וַתֹּ֤אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> אֵלָיו֙ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> אִיזֶ֣בֶל <sup>348 </sup> <n>And Jezebel</n> אִשְׁתּ֔וֹ <sup>802 </sup> <n>his wife</n> אַתָּ֕ה <sup>859 </sup> <n>you</n> עַתָּ֛ה <sup>6258 </sup> <n>now</n> תַּעֲשֶׂ֥ה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>unto him Dost thou now govern</n> מְלוּכָ֖ה <sup>4410 </sup> <n>the kingdom</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>over</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>Israel</n> ק֤וּם <sup>6965 </sup> <n>abide</n> אֱכָל־ <sup>398 </sup> <n>[and] eat</n> לֶ֙חֶם֙ <sup>3899 </sup> <n>bread</n> וְיִטַ֣ב <sup>3190 </sup> <n>be merry</n> לִבֶּ֔ךָ <sup>3820 </sup> <n>and let thine heart</n> אֲנִי֙ <sup>589 </sup> <n>I</n> אֶתֵּ֣ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>I will give</n> לְךָ֔ אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> כֶּ֖רֶם <sup>3754 </sup> <n>thee the vineyard</n> נָב֥וֹת <sup>5022 </sup> <n>of Naboth</n> הַיִּזְרְעֵאלִֽי׃ <sup>3158 </sup> <n>the Jezreelite</n>
8: וַתִּכְתֹּ֤ב <sup>3789 </sup> <n>So she wrote</n> סְפָרִים֙ <sup>5612 </sup> <n>letters</n> בְּשֵׁ֣ם <sup>8034 </sup> <n>name</n> אַחְאָ֔ב <sup>256 </sup> <n>in Ahab's</n> וַתַּחְתֹּ֖ם <sup>2368 </sup> <n>[them] with his seal</n> בְּחֹתָמ֑וֹ <sup>2856 </sup> <n>and sealed</n> וַתִּשְׁלַ֣ח <sup>7971 </sup> <n>and sent</n> [הַסְפָרִים כ] (סְפָרִ֗ים <sup>5612 </sup> <n>letters</n> ק) אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> הַזְקֵנִ֤ים <sup>2205 </sup> <n>unto the elders</n> וְאֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>and to</n> הַֽחֹרִים֙ <sup>2715 </sup> <n>and to the nobles</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> בְּעִיר֔וֹ <sup>5892 </sup> <n>that [were] in his city</n> הַיֹּשְׁבִ֖ים <sup>3427 </sup> <n>dwelling</n> אֶת־ <sup>854 </sup> <n>with</n> נָבֽוֹת׃ <sup>5022 </sup> <n>with Naboth</n>
9: וַתִּכְתֹּ֥ב <sup>3789 </sup> <n>And she wrote</n> בַּסְּפָרִ֖ים <sup>5612 </sup> <n>in the letters</n> לֵאמֹ֑ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>saying</n> קִֽרְאוּ־ <sup>7121 </sup> <n>Proclaim</n> צ֔וֹם <sup>6685 </sup> <n>a fast</n> וְהוֹשִׁ֥יבוּ <sup>3427 </sup> <n>and set</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> נָב֖וֹת <sup>5022 </sup> <n>Naboth</n> בְּרֹ֥אשׁ <sup>7218 </sup> <n>on high</n> הָעָֽם׃ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>among the people</n>
10: וְ֠הוֹשִׁיבוּ <sup>3427 </sup> <n>And set</n> שְׁנַ֨יִם <sup>8147 </sup> <n>two</n> אֲנָשִׁ֥ים <sup>582 </sup> <n>men</n> בְּנֵֽי־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>sons</n> בְלִיַּעַל֮ <sup>1100 </sup> <n>of Belial</n> נֶגְדּוֹ֒ <sup>5048 </sup> <n>before</n> וִיעִדֻ֣הוּ <sup>5749 </sup> <n>before him to bear witness</n> לֵאמֹ֔ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>against him saying</n> בֵּרַ֥כְתָּ <sup>1288 </sup> <n>Thou didst blaspheme</n> אֱלֹהִ֖ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>God</n> וָמֶ֑לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>and the king</n> וְהוֹצִיאֻ֥הוּ <sup>3318 </sup> <n>And [then] carry him out</n> וְסִקְלֻ֖הוּ <sup>5619 </sup> <n>and stone</n> וְיָמֹֽת׃ <sup>4191 </sup> <n>him that he may die</n>
11: וַיַּעֲשׂוּ֩ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>did</n> אַנְשֵׁ֨י <sup>376 </sup> <n>the men</n> עִיר֜וֹ <sup>5892 </sup> <n>of his city</n> הַזְּקֵנִ֣ים <sup>2205 </sup> <n>[even] the elders</n> וְהַחֹרִ֗ים <sup>2715 </sup> <n>and the nobles</n> אֲשֶׁ֤ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> הַיֹּֽשְׁבִים֙ <sup>3427 </sup> <n>who were the inhabitants</n> בְּעִיר֔וֹ <sup>5892 </sup> <n>in his city</n> כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> שָׁלְחָ֥ה <sup>7971 </sup> <n>had sent</n> אֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <sup>413 </sup> <n>as</n> אִיזָ֑בֶל <sup>348 </sup> <n>as Jezebel</n> כַּאֲשֶׁ֤ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> כָּתוּב֙ <sup>3789 </sup> <n>unto them [and] as it [was] written</n> בַּסְּפָרִ֔ים <sup>5612 </sup> <n>in the letters</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> שָׁלְחָ֖ה <sup>7971 </sup> <n>which she had sent</n> אֲלֵיהֶֽם׃ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n>
12: קָרְא֖וּ <sup>7121 </sup> <n>They proclaimed</n> צ֑וֹם <sup>6685 </sup> <n>a fast</n> וְהֹשִׁ֥יבוּ <sup>3427 </sup> <n>and set</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> נָב֖וֹת <sup>5022 </sup> <n>Naboth</n> בְּרֹ֥אשׁ <sup>7218 </sup> <n>on high</n> הָעָֽם׃ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>among the people</n>
13: וַ֠יָּבֹאוּ <sup>935 </sup> <n>And there came</n> שְׁנֵ֨י <sup>8147 </sup> <n>in two</n> הָאֲנָשִׁ֥ים <sup>376 </sup> <n>men</n> בְּנֵֽי־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>children</n> בְלִיַּעַל֮ <sup>1100 </sup> <n>of Belial</n> וַיֵּשְׁב֣וּ <sup>3427 </sup> <n>and sat</n> נֶגְדּוֹ֒ <sup>5048 </sup> <n>before</n> וַיְעִדֻהוּ֩ <sup>5749 </sup> <n>witnessed</n> אַנְשֵׁ֨י <sup>376 </sup> <n>men</n> הַבְּלִיַּ֜עַל <sup>1100 </sup> <n>of Belial</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> נָב֗וֹת <sup>5022 </sup> <n>against him [even] against Naboth</n> נֶ֤גֶד <sup>5048 </sup> <n>before</n> הָעָם֙ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>in the presence of the people</n> לֵאמֹ֔ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>saying</n> בֵּרַ֥ךְ <sup>1288 </sup> <n>did blaspheme</n> נָב֛וֹת <sup>5022 </sup> <n>Naboth</n> אֱלֹהִ֖ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>God</n> וָמֶ֑לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>and the king</n> וַיֹּצִאֻ֙הוּ֙ <sup>3318 </sup> <n>Then they carried him forth</n> מִח֣וּץ <sup>2351 </sup> <n>out</n> לָעִ֔יר <sup>5892 </sup> <n>of the city</n> וַיִּסְקְלֻ֥הוּ <sup>5619 </sup> <n>and stoned</n> בָאֲבָנִ֖ים <sup>68 </sup> <n>him with stones</n> וַיָּמֹֽת׃ <sup>4191 </sup> <n>that he died</n>
14: וַֽיִּשְׁלְח֖וּ <sup>7971 </sup> <n>Then they sent</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> אִיזֶ֣בֶל <sup>348 </sup> <n>to Jezebel</n> לֵאמֹ֑ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>saying</n> סֻקַּ֥ל <sup>5619 </sup> <n>is stoned</n> נָב֖וֹת <sup>5022 </sup> <n>Naboth</n> וַיָּמֹֽת׃ <sup>4191 </sup> <n>and is dead</n>
15: וַֽיְהִי֙ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> כִּשְׁמֹ֣עַ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>heard</n> אִיזֶ֔בֶל <sup>348 </sup> <n>And it came to pass when Jezebel</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> סֻקַּ֥ל <sup>5619 </sup> <n>was stoned</n> נָב֖וֹת <sup>5022 </sup> <n>that Naboth</n> וַיָּמֹ֑ת <sup>4191 </sup> <n>and was dead</n> וַתֹּ֨אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> אִיזֶ֜בֶל <sup>348 </sup> <n>that Jezebel</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> אַחְאָ֗ב <sup>256 </sup> <n>to Ahab</n> ק֣וּם <sup>6965 </sup> <n>Arise</n> רֵ֞שׁ <sup>3423 </sup> <n>take possession</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> כֶּ֣רֶם ׀ <sup>3754 </sup> <n>of the vineyard</n> נָב֣וֹת <sup>5022 </sup> <n>of Naboth</n> הַיִּזְרְעֵאלִ֗י <sup>3158 </sup> <n>the Jezreelite</n> אֲשֶׁ֤ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> מֵאֵן֙ <sup>3985 </sup> <n>which he refused</n> לָתֶת־ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>to give</n> לְךָ֣ בְכֶ֔סֶף <sup>3701 </sup> <n>thee for money</n> כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> אֵ֥ין <sup>369 </sup> <n>for</n> נָב֛וֹת <sup>5022 </sup> <n>for Naboth</n> חַ֖י <sup>2416 </sup> <n>is not alive</n> כִּי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>but</n> מֵֽת׃ <sup>4191 </sup> <n>but dead</n>
